Tariff.Name: Single Trip
Tariff.Description: Rate 1 = for travel in a zone. Rate 2 = for journeys that extend over 2 zones. Rate 3 = for journeys that extend over 3 zones. Rate 4 = for journeys that extend over 4 zones or more.

GenericParameterAssignment.Name: Single zone use must be done in 60 minutes
Two zone use must be done in 90 minutes
Three zone use must be done in 120 minutes
Four zone use must be done in 150minutes

GroupTicket.Name: Primary School Group Ticket
GroupTicket.Description: children and staff in primary schools who travel together during school hours can do so at a greatly reduced price. Primary schools can in the period from kl. 09:00 to 13:30 on weekdays travel with the local buses and only pay NOK. 7, - per person.

GroupTicket.Name: Group Ticket
GroupTicket.Description: It must be possible to buy a single ticket for several people in different categories on the same ticket. If 3 tickets or more are purchased in total, it must automatically give a price for a group ticket on a bus. When a minimum of 3 people travel together, a 33% discount is given on an adult single ticket. Children and seniors tickets are not discounted, but these count in the group. The category Children under 0-5 years must also be included in the group. (Children under 0-5 years are free). Group tickets must be paid in full and only one ticket is issued.

ValidableElement.Name: Single Trip
ValidableElement.Description: A single trip within the specifed zone.

SalesOfferPackage.Name: Single Ticket - onboard paper ticket
SalesOfferPackage.Description: Walk up anonmpous purchase - no capping rights

SalesOfferPackage.Name: Single Ticket - mobile app
SalesOfferPackage.Description: Enkeltbillett i appen Vy og på vy.no.

GenericParameterAssignment.Name: Entitled to capping discount
GenericParameterAssignment.Description: Purchase of product on mobile app counts towards capping discount

GenericParameterAssignment.Name: Entitled to capping discount
GenericParameterAssignment.Description: Purchase of product on mobile app counts towards capping discount

FareDemandFactor.Name: Off peak
FareDemandFactor.Description: Travel outside the periods 07:00 - 09:00 and 14: 00-17: 00 on weekdays.

FareStructureElement.Name: Alloed periods fo travel
FareStructureElement.Description: Choice of anyime or outside rush hour

FareStructureElement.Name: Must buy eason ticket in adavcne

PreassignedFareProduct.Name: 24 hours Vestfold
PreassignedFareProduct.Description: 24 hour pass valid from moment of actviation until same time next day

ValidableElement.Name: 24 hours travel
ValidableElement.Description: A single trip within the specifed zone.

PreassignedFareProduct.Name: 7 day Vestfold pass
PreassignedFareProduct.Description: 7 day pass valid from day of purchase or activation until end of fare day 7.
PreassignedFareProduct.CappedDiscountRightRef: Does this Counts towards 30 day product ? check

PreassignedFareProduct.Name: 30 days Vestfold pass
PreassignedFareProduct.Description: 30 day pass valid from day of purchase or activation until end of fare day 30.

PreassignedFareProduct.Name: 180 days Vestfold pass
PreassignedFareProduct.Description: 180 day pass valid from day of purchase or activation until end of fare day 180.

Tariff.Name: Vy on-the-fly rebate
Tariff.Description: The PTO has defined a set of rules that reduces the price of a fare product based on the number of previous purchases within a (specified) 30 day period when all ticket purchases have the same geographical parameters, level of service (in practice: same fare class) and user profile:

QualityStructureFactor.Name: first 4 single ticket purchases at full rate
next purchases (tickets number 5-10) at a discount e.g. 30 %
next purchases (tickets number 11-20) at a discount e.g. 60%
further purchases within the 30 day period at no cost

FareStructureElement.Name: Which products are eligble for discount (NBCould get fancier and have different steps for different products)

PriceGroup.Name: Concessionary prices
PriceGroup.Description: The same concessionary prices are reused
